name: AmourVortex
storyline:
Amour Vortex is an indygame we made for the wedding of our beloved friends Mel&Ben;.
Developed in secrecy for about 4 months, under the groom’s nose, it remained a total surprise.
This co-op action plateformer covers their first date, the mariage and their quest to get back a bunch of shared memories.
summary: Amour Vortex is an indygame we made for the wedding of our beloved friends Mel&Ben. Developed in secrecy for about 4 months, under the groom’s nose, it remained a total surprise. This co-op action plateformer covers their first date, the mariage and their quest to get back a bunch of shared memories.
